nodes.text: Rebecca Roanhorse (born 1971) is the author of the 2019 canon adult novel Resistance Reborn. Roanhorse lives in Northern New Mexico alongside her husband, her daughter and her dogs. She owes her love for Star Wars to her older brother Tony, who let her without complaining play with his action figures (including one of Boba Fett) when they were little. Roanhorse adapts the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes "Brothers" and "Revenge" in The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark.
